finalization.title: Finalize your SBC Connect account
finalization.subtitle: Finalize your SBC Connect account to continue to the Short Term Rental Registration application.
finalization.name: Your Name
finalization.disclaimer: This is your legal name as it appears on your BC Services Card.

application-confirm.submitted-for: Short term registry application submitted for the following property:
application-confirm.will-review: Your application will be reviewed by our team and we will email you with next steps.
application-confirm.bc-reg-link: Visit your BC Registries Online Services profile page

contact.title: Step 1 - Contact Information
contact.subtitle: Primary Contact Information
contact.disclaimer: This is your legal name as it appears on your BC Services Card.
contact.useMailing: Use my mailing address for the rental property address

contact-form.warning: Email will be default method of communication. Notices sent to your email address will be deemed received on the third day after the email is sent.

property-form.subtitle: Rental Unit Information
property-form.useMailing: Use my mailing address for the rental property address
property-form.primaryDwelling: All or part of primary dwelling

principal-residence.provincial-rules: Provincial rules limit the operation of short-term rentals in BC to
principal-residence.provincial-rules-continued: or a secondary suite on the same property.
principal-residence.radio-legend: My property is in a community where the principal residence applies
principal-residence.reason-hint: Please enter the reason why the principal residence requirement does not apply to this property
principal-residence.service-hint: Please specify the type of accommodation service provider
principal-residence.required-docs: Please submit required documentation that confirms that the property being registered is a principal residence.
principal-residence.upload-multiple: Upload one or more supporting documents
principal-residence.file-reqs: File must be a .pdf, .jpg, .doc, or .png. Maximum file size 50 MB.
principal-residence.declare:
As required by section 14 (2) of the Short-Term Accommodations Rental Act (the Act), I declare the property host will comply with the principal residence restriction in the Act and provide the short-term rental accommodation services described in this registration in one or both of: 
 a. the property host’s principal residence, 
 b.not more than one secondary suite or other accessory dwelling unit that is on the land parcel associated with the property host's principal residence. 
 I understand that if the property host does not comply with the requirement to provide the short-term rental accommodation services in the principal residence, I may be subject to enforcement action under Part 4 of the Act, including being ordered to pay an administrative penalty.
principal-residence.consent: I consent to the Ministry of Finance sharing data and information about me with the Short-Term Rental Branch. I understand the information will be shared to confirm that the property being registered is my principal residence or a secondary suite or accessory dwelling unit on the same land parcel as my principal residence. If you provide consent, it may speed our review and approval of your registration.
principal-residence.no: No, principal residence does not apply or my property is exempt
principal-residence.yes: Yes, my property has a principal residence requirement
principal-residence.institution: Educational institution accommodation (Student or Employee) (off campus)

review.review-instructions: Please review all of the information entered below.
review.review-instructions-continued: Please note that some information in this application can not be changed once the form has been submitted
review.declaration-part-one: As required by section 14 (2) of the Short-Term Accommodations Rental Act (the Act), I declare the property host will comply with the principal residence restriction in the Act and provide the short-term rental accommodation services described in this registration in one or both of:
review.declaration-b: not more than one secondary suite or other accessory dwelling unit that is on the land parcel associated with the property host's principal residence.
review.declaration-part-two: I understand that if the property host does not comply with the requirement to provide the short-term rental accommodation services in the principal residence, I may be subject to enforcement action under Part 4 of the Act, including being ordered to pay an administrative penalty.
review.confirm: I confirm that the information contained in the application for registration is accurate and true. I understand that, if I have knowingly provided inaccurate or false, I may be the subject of enforcement action under Part 4 of the Short-Term Rental Accommodations Act, including being ordered to pay an administrative penalty.

details.title: Step 2 - Add Your Short Term Rental Property Details
details.subtitle: Tell us more about the property you plan to offer for short-term rental. If you have other properties you want to register and offer as short-term rentals, we will ask you about them later.

account.title: Existing Account Found
account.existing-account-warning: It looks like you already have an account with BC Registries and Online Services. You can use an existing account to proceed or create a new one.

existing-account-section.title: Your Existing Accounts
existing-account-section.sub-title: Select an account below or create a new one
